report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-24422 Dell EMC iDRAC9 Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-24422 Dell EMC iDRAC9 Vulnerability
text: Dell EMC iDRAC9 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper authentication. By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access the VNC Console.
